paragraphs.text: The asphyxiated politics of the Muslim world.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: With
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: ISIL spurring negative media for the past six months and other violent groups competing not far behind in evil acts
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Muslims everywhere have been licking their wounds in recent times
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: 2014 has been worse
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the crises are worsening
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Will the Muslim world be able to pull itself up from this low or enter into long-term anarchy?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The fundamental reason behind this shameful situation in many Muslim countries is clearly the failure of political leadership, exacerbated by the sheepish role of the religious scholars and an absence of a strong civil society
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Islam is still central to Muslim life
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: it once shaped Muslims into a successful global community - an "ummah" of purpose - with a few core beliefs, values and deeds for the good of all
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In spite of many pitfalls, sometimes big, Muslims succeeded in building a civilisation that upheld universal human values, blended with the Islamic principles of pluralism
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Unpleasant state of affairs
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: But
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: with an increasing knowledge deficit over centuries, the Muslim social and spiritual capitals were dwindling
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As their individual life was losing the spark of faith and positive action, their public life or political leadership was taken over by people of lower moral clarity and spiritual strength
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Much of the world of Islam is now riddled with political strangulation, economic mismanagement and social division
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The post-colonial breed of corrupt, incompetent and often repressive rulers - having little regard for the ordinary people and their human rights or respect for the rule of law - have made their countries ungovernable
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Some are no better than the Soviet-era communist rulers
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Failed politics has widened the rift between political camps, particularly between secularists and Islamists, in some countries
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This has worsened the social divide, with increased intolerance and violence
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: All this is impacting negatively on the nascent Muslim minority communities in the West
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The collapse of politics in Iraq and Syria in recent years set off a ruthless proxy war in these historic lands, with the destruction of infrastructure and an unprecedented refugee crisis
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The rise of ISIL and its alluring attraction of young recruits from around the world, including from Muslim minority countries, has raised global Islamophobia to a new level
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Politicians are meant to act in the interests of their people
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: It is not only their civic duty but for a Muslim politician it is their Islamic obligation as well
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: No matter what their background is, they should work with fellow politicians with grace and a team ethos - as co-citizens and co-religionists, not as enemies to one another
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This is not too big of a demand in the 21st century
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The overwhelming majority of Muslims across the world are ordinary hardworking people, with love for their land and religion
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They hate extremism and violence, whether political or religious
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They expect some competency and humility from their social and political leaders
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: A call for a truce between
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: opposing political forces
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: But in much of the Muslim world this is not the case presently
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: politics has become an Achilles' heel
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This legacy may go back to their dark days under colonial "divide and rule"
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: this can no longer be an excuse
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It is shocking that some Arab countries have degenerated into bloodletting between people of the same history and religion that made them great
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They are on the verge of regressing to the days of pre-Islamic "jahiliya" (ignorance)
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Aside from the influence of unhelpful global politics, the root cause lies in the failure of their own political and religious leaders
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Unless
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Muslim politicians and civic leaders come to their senses and adopt people-oriented principled politics, improve their accountability and regard themselves as people's servants
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: the situation is going to get worse
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The current blame game is meaningless
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Politicians do have a higher degree of responsibility to bring a nation out of the political mess
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: one should not forget that they originate from the society and carry its values, norms and culture
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The whole society must now come to its senses and stand up against this self-annihilation
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The bloodletting between diehard secularists and inexperienced hard-line Islamists in some countries is a boon to entrenched dictators to dig their heels and hegemonic powers to milk national wealth
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Islam is indeed very broad and has the ability to accommodate anyone and everyone
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: So, the difference between a Muslim secularist and an Islamist is a matter of degree
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This is being blown up by people of ulterior motives and must be challenged
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Secularists have been in power in much of the Muslim world for decades
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: they do not want to bow out without a fight
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Islamists want to unseat them
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: but lack the political experience in running the affairs of modern statecraft
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Behind the furore, a democratic deficit and lack of confidence are big issues for many politicians
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The demons must be slain
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Wise individuals, senior citizens and authoritative institutions should raise their voice of sanity and help set the national conversation among politicians
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Secularists should accept the social reality that there are Islamists in their midst
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: on the other hand
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Islamists will also do better
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: if
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: they recognise that secularism is part of modern reality
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Both groups consist of human beings and cannot be exterminated
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: 'Live and let live'
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: There is no short-cut to end the chronic and acute political crisis in the Muslim world
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But it is vital all political groups work on the basis of existing socio-political realities and find ways to reconcile with the principle of"live and let live"
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Sensible and moderate people from various political camps should sit together, informally and formally, and find a pragmatic political framework to make democratic politics institutional and allow healthy transition of power
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Every citizen has a right to rule
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The long awaited Arab Spring and its failure in most countries have made things worse
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: However
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it has also left powerful legacy and lessons
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The failure in Egypt and ongoing experiment in Tunisia are too vivid to ignore
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The nobility in politics lies in bringing happiness to people's lives, peace in society and raising the dignity of a people
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Muslim politicians would do better
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: if
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: they keep in mind their Prophet's timeless statement:"A leader of a people is their servant."
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The world of Islam is at a crossroad, either to make or break
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: There are plenty of talented and visionary people with personal integrity in Muslim societies
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: who should now come to politics and make a serious effort to cleanse it from the dirt
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Let there arise a new breed of Muslim politicians who have the steel and skill of turning anarchy into optimism
paragraphs.label: other
